response.overview: On September 17, 2017, the Saijo City General Gymnasium in Saijo hosted Day 7 of NJPW Road To Destruction 2017.  The main event featured Los Ingobernables de Japon (BUSHI, EVIL, Hiromu Takahashi, SANADA & Tetsuya Naito) vs CHAOS (Kazuchika Okada, Rocky Romero, Tomohiro Ishii, Toru Yano & Will Ospreay).  The card also featured War Machine (Hanson & Raymond Rowe), Hiroshi Tanahashi & Togi Makabe vs Suzuki-gun (Davey Boy Smith Jr., Lance Archer, TAKA Michinoku & Takashi Iizuka).  Other wrestlers on the show include Ricochet, Hirai Kawato, and Hiroyoshi Tenzan.
response.title: NJPW Road To Destruction 2017: Day 7
